thread.title: Five Men Shot — 3 Fatally — At Brighton Park Residence
thread.title_full: Five Men Shot — 3 Fatally — At Brighton Park Residence

title: Five Men Shot — 3 Fatally — At Brighton Park Residence

locations.name: brighton park residence five men shot

text:
Five Men Shot — 3 Fatally — At Brighton Park Residence February 15, 2017 4:09 PM Filed Under: Brighton Park , Charlie De Mar , fatal shooting 
(CBS) — Five men were shot – three fatally – Wednesday afternoon in a Brighton Park residence, Chicago police say. 
The victims were in a residence in the 3900 block of South Albany when a suspect entered the home around 3 p.m. and fired a weapon. 
Two males, ages 18 and 19, were pronounced dead at the scene and a third was pronounced at Mt. Sinai Hospital. 
Two others were taken to hospitals in critical condition. UPDATE: 5 people shot, 3 dead, 2 in critical in Brighton Park home pic.twitter.com/tnmmYwTNzV 
— Charlie De Mar (@CharlieDeMar) February 15, 2017 
Investigators believe drugs may be the motive for the shooting.
